entry.tran: 使人痛苦的;令人苦恼的;使人忧虑的
entry.def: If something is distressing, it upsets you or worries you.

example.ex: It is very distressing to see your baby attached to tubes and monitors...
example.tran: 看见自己宝宝身上连着各种管子和监视器，心里会非常痛苦。

example.ex: Tranquillizers help alleviate the distressing symptoms of anxiety.
example.tran: 镇静剂有助于缓解焦虑所带来的不安症状。
